HomePage.title: LifeSync · Holistic Health
HomePage.typeText: Focusing on mind-body health, empowering personalized management with data and emotional support.%Integrating community, AI assistant, and multi-device sync for comprehensive health management.%Positive reinforcement helps build lasting healthy habits.%Data-driven insights + emotional support make health management less lonely.%Your personal health advisor, providing professional guidance anytime.

features.title: Holistic Health Management Features
features.subtitle: Our platform provides comprehensive health management functions to help you achieve coordinated development of physical and mental health.

physicalHealth.title: Physical Health Monitoring
physicalHealth.description: Comprehensively record and analyze your physical health data, including multi-dimensional information such as exercise, sleep, and diet.

mentalHealth.title: Mental Health Assessment
mentalHealth.description: Through scientific psychological evaluation tools, help you understand your mental state and adjust your mental health in a timely manner.

emotionManagement.title: Emotion Management
emotionManagement.description: Record emotional changes, provide emotional regulation methods, and help you maintain a positive and optimistic attitude.

healthRisk.title: Health Risk Warning
healthRisk.description: Based on your health data, predict potential health risks and provide personalized health advice.

aiAssistant.title: AI Health Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Intelligent AI assistant provides 24-hour health consultation services, answering health questions and providing professional advice.

multiDevice.title: Multi-device Data Synchronization
multiDevice.description: Support data synchronization of various health devices, integrate various health data, and provide a comprehensive health view.

cta.title: Begin Your Holistic Health Journey
cta.description: Join us and experience a new way of coordinated physical and mental health management, making health management simple and effective.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.description: Login with GitHub or Google account
login.termsText: By clicking login, you agree to our

register.title: Create Account
register.description: Register a new account to use full features
register.termsText: By clicking register, you agree to our

Community.createPostDescription: Share your thoughts, experiences, or questions with the community
Community.editPostDescription: Update your post content, title, or tags
Community.confirmDeletePost: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
Community.confirmDeleteComment: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
Community.commentsCount: {count, plural, =0 {No comments} one {# comment} other {# comments}}
Community.likesCount: {count, plural, =0 {No likes} one {# like} other {# likes}}
Community.postPublishedDescription: Your post has been published successfully and is now visible to the community
Community.postUpdatedDescription: Your post has been updated successfully with the latest changes

Store.pointsDescription: Points can be used to redeem various health courses and resources. Earn more points by recording health data and participating in community activities.
Store.earnPointsDescription: Earn points through the following methods to redeem your favorite health courses and resources. Points can be used throughout the platform to help you achieve your health goals.

postCreation.title: Create Posts
postCreation.description: Share your health experiences, insights, or questions in the community. Each quality post earns you points.

comment.title: Comment & Interact
comment.description: Participate in community discussions, reply to others' posts, and provide valuable advice or support. Each comment earns points.

dailyCheckIn.title: Daily Check-in
dailyCheckIn.description: Log in to the app and complete your daily check-in. Consecutive check-ins earn bonus points.

healthDataSync.title: Health Data Sync
healthDataSync.description: Sync your health devices (like smartwatches, fitness bands, etc.) with the app. Recording health data earns you points.

challengeCompletion.title: Complete Health Challenges
challengeCompletion.description: Participate in and complete various health challenges initiated by the platform, such as exercise, diet, meditation, etc., to earn substantial points.

notifications.purchaseError: Purchase failed. Please try again later.
notifications.insufficientPoints: Not enough points to purchase this course.
notifications.alreadyPurchased: You have already purchased this course.

Store.motivationalQuote1: Health is not just a state of the body, but a balance of the mind.
Store.motivationalQuote2: Every small healthy habit is an investment in your future.
Store.motivationalQuote3: Knowledge is the power to change lives, and learning is a lifelong journey.
Store.motivationalQuote4: Take care of yourself first, so you can better care for others.
Store.motivationalQuote5: A healthy body is the dwelling place of the mind, let's build it together.
Store.motivationalSubtext: Use your points to start your health learning journey

Evaluate.evaluateDescription: Explore various psychological assessments to understand your personality traits, emotional state, and sleep quality
Evaluate.chooseTest: Choose a test to begin your mental health assessment journey
Evaluate.tryDifferentSearch: Please try a different search term or category
Evaluate.testNotFoundDescription: Sorry, we couldn't find the test you requested. Please return to the test list to choose another test.
Evaluate.testCompletedDescription: You have completed the {testName} test. Here are your results and personalized recommendations.

personality.title: Personality Tests
personality.description: Understand your personality traits, strengths, and potential growth areas

anxiety.title: Anxiety Tests
anxiety.description: Assess your current anxiety levels and get relief suggestions

depression.title: Depression Tests
depression.description: Understand your emotional state and get professional support suggestions

sleep.title: Sleep Quality
sleep.description: Evaluate your sleep quality and get methods to improve sleep
